title: help I can't upvote or make discussions
body: Im level 30 but when I try to upvote it tells me I just be level 7? And when I try to make discussion in any other board it says I must be level 30

replies.body: Kokua's got your back!  Let me know if you run into any issues!

Posting here or using the [syncing tool](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/fos1aFEB-boards-profile-syncing-tool) updates your in game level with the forum. You should be able to post your discussion now.
